definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: This subject regards Mine-used rubber-tired forklift as the research object.
sentences.chinese: 本課題以礦用膠輪剷車爲研究對象。

sentences.english: Rubber wheel be adjusted by motorized, easy to adjust, more personal.
sentences.chinese: 押料膠輪採用電動調整，方便調機操作，更加人性化。

sentences.english: The typical cryogenic crushing circuit for waste rubber recovery is also given.
sentences.chinese: 同時給出了低溫粉碎回收廢舊橡膠輪胎的典型流程。

sentences.english: The plastic wheel uses fast detachable type, convenient for change-over which takes only two minutes to complete.
sentences.chinese: 膠輪採用快拆式，換裝方便，僅需分兩分鐘即可完成。

sentences.english: Using special rubber to remove the thermoplastic material which sticks on the lasts.
sentences.chinese: 可由特殊膠輪簡易除去殘留楦頭上之熱熔膠。

sentences.english: Rubber tires thrown into landfills decompose very slowly.
sentences.chinese: 扔進垃圾填埋場的橡膠輪胎分解非常慢。

sentences.english: Trains model VAL256 stopped at a station.
sentences.chinese: 停靠站內的木柵線VAL256型膠輪捷運列車。
